entries.author: evan_miller
entries.text: A long review of Rakudo that tries to give a balanced perspective, after using it for a while, and writing a small library in it. One of his summary lines is that Rakudo "lacks a strong 'hook', and it's also kind of slow", and also "certainly alone in the audacity of its ambitions and sheer complexity of the language".

header: The European Perl Conference has finished, and it looks to have been a good 'un. You can watch videos of some of the talks, and more will eventually become available.

subject: Winter, er CPAN Day, is coming!
